comment: Define the value of the ` logb ` function, the logarithm generalized to an arbitrary base, when used in the 2-argument form ` logb <. B , X >. ` (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 21-Jan-2017.) (Revised by David A. Wheeler, 16-Jul-2017.)
